sentences.sContent: Using ethnographic interviews at the beginning of the process allows you, as a designer, to truly understand your users, their needs, and their motivations.
sentences.sContent_eng: Using ethnographic interviews at the beginning of the process allows you, as a designer, to truly understand your users, their needs, and their motivations.
sentences.sCn: 在开发过程的早期使用人种学调查允许你作为设计师真正理解你的用户——他们的需求和动机。

remMethod.val: 来自ethnography(n. 人种学， 人种论)

words.tran: 人种志学者；民族志学者

trans.tranCn: 人种学的， 人种论的
trans.tranOther: Ethnographic refers to things that are connected with or relate to ethnography
